item.title: Items are spawning on ground and not in my inventory
item.dc:creator: @team_boy team boy
item.description:
@team_boy wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:725: error: cannot find sy mbol c.getPA().addItem(); ^ symbol: method addItem() location: class PlayerAssistant 1 error Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

error i found this code in a txt but it isnt working i get same error as above
c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, amount);

item.title: Items are spawning on ground and not in my inventory
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“team boy, post:3, topic:442752”]i know so some one needs to help me :o
you know how it gets in my inventory?[/quote]

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], NPCHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, NPCHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId);

From that horrendous code I can conclude you’re using a PI, disgusting. Nonetheless to answer your question

c.getPA().addItem()?

This has all been well-documented, and if you “know” that that was your problem then I’m positive you know how to look up the paramaters for a method…

item.title: Items are spawning on ground and not in my inventory
item.dc:creator: @team_boy team boy
item.description:
@team_boy wrote:

if (c.hasFollower == 6874) { for (int i = 0; i < 29; i += 1) { if (NPCHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid] != null) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], NPCHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, NPCHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId); c.storeditems[i] = -1; c.occupied[i] = false; } } }
when i do take bob the items are spawning on the ground but they need to spawn in my inventory
can some one change the code above here that the item spawns in my inventory

thanks
